Ingredients.3: 0.5 teaspoon kosher salt, or more to taste

Ingredients.5: 0.25 cup butter, cut into cubes and softened

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).

Directions.2: Mix flour, sugar, salt, and paprika together in a stand mixer fitted with the paddle attachment. Add butter and mix until small crumbs form. Slowly add water and mix until a semi-stiff dough forms. Divide dough in half.

Directions.3: Roll on a lightly floured surface to a thickness of 1/8 inch; cut into desired shapes and transfer to a baking sheet. Lightly prick each cracker a few times with a fork or toothpick. Sprinkle with additional salt. Repeat with remaining dough.

Directions.4: Bake in the preheated oven until crispy and lightly bronzed in color, 5 to 7 minutes. Remove from the oven and transfer to a wire rack to cool. Cool and store or serve as desired.
